long_description: The Casio SGW400H-1BV multifunction watch offers a rich feature set to assist with all your outdoor adventures. Its digital altimeter, barometer and thermometer will keep you informed on the go. Altimeter tracks altitude from -2,300 to 32,800 ft. (-700 to 10,000m) in 20 ft. (5m) increments. Barometer tracks atmospheric pressure changes from 260 to 1,100 hPa (7.68 to 32.49 inHg). Thermometer displays temperatures in increments of 0.2degF (0.1degC) ranging from 14 - 140degF (-10 - 60degC). Digital face displays date, timer and time in 12- or 24-hr. format. World time keeps you on time in 31 time zones (48 major cities); includes city code display and daylight saving on/off. Features 5 daily alarms, stopwatch, countdown timer, hourly chime and auto calendar pre-programmed until the year 2099. 1/1,000-sec. stopwatch measures elapsed time and split times. EL backlight with afterglow lets you see the display in the dark. CR2016 battery lasts approximately 2 yrs. The Casio SGW400H-1BV multifunction watch is water resistant to 100m (330 ft.) and operates in temperatures as low as 14degF/-10degC.
short_description: The Casio SGW400H-1BV multifunction watch offers a rich feature set to assist with all your outdoor adventures. Its digital altimeter, barometer and thermometer will keep you informed on the go.
